name: Skelecool and Lumberjack
description:
________________________________________________________________________

Skelecool was the coolest skeleton in the land

So cool that skeletons around the world started a trumpet-band!

And a party in the woods! That's cool right?

But Lumberjack didn't get an invinte.

"They'll ruin my forest!" Lumberjack said

"Touch my trees and you will be dead!"

________________________________________________________________________

WHAT? 

Play as Lumberjack who tries to purify his forest from roller-skating-skeletons.

Throw your axe towards these bone-piles as fast as you can!


________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS :

W / A / S / D  or  ARROW- keys 

MOVE AROUND

MOUSE - buttons

THROW YOUR AXE


________________________________________________________________________

JamDNA 10 - Criteria:

#1 Hack and slash - although the game can be taken as 'puzzler', it's a fighting game at the same time. With your axe you can either run in there and hit everything you touch or plan ahead your moves. Try avoiding hitting trees and colliding with skeletons yourself.

#2 Nature - You play as Lumberjack who (ironically) wants to defend his woods from party-skeletons who also kinda represents dying nature, or undead to be exact. If you accidentally cut off one of your trees it has a negative effect on you, so be wary of that.

#3 Inertia - These skeletons, as you also, move with roller-skates (of course)! So every time you move in one direction, you keep moving in that direction until you hit a wall.  Thanks to this mechanism some levels are designed to keep you moving!

#4 Fanfare Music -

(the whole soundtrack is made only using DOOT's and Doot's, sound effects are made with basic bfxr-sounds.)

________________________________________________________________________

Tools used:

GMS2, Flstudio20, bfxr.
